channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta’s recent ads signal a rising societal problem

item.title: What Recent Domain Trends Signal About Global Brand Strategy
item.description: Strengthen your company’s digital visibility with the right domain name.

item.title: 3 software building fundamentals your customers will love
item.description: In a crowded market, building strong, lasting relationships is one of the biggest differentiators a business can create. And while product-market fit ...

item.title: ‘AI is way beyond the hype phase’: Experts warn businesses must reskill for the new reality
item.description: Companies must not only develop existing talent but also rethink the skills they are sourcing.

item.title: Why U.S. business leaders must work together

item.title: Is Your Company Optimized for Generative AI? This GEO Startup Says It Should Be
item.description: The Prompting Company just raised $6.5 million to help businesses improve their visibility in generative AI search results.

item.title: What Your Company Can Expect As Employer Health Insurance Costs Climb in 2026
item.description: Employer-provided family health insurance plan prices rose 6 percent this year, and will likely increase by double-digits next year.

item.title: Judges order Trump administration to use emergency reserves for SNAP payments during the shutdown
item.description: The administration said it wasn’t allowed to use a contingency fund of about $5 billion for the food-aid program.

item.title: Outback Steakhouse shuttered restaurants: Beloved casual dining chain closes locations in 8 states
item.description: Fans of the Outback Steakhouse chain will be disappointed to learn that its parent company, Bloomin’ Brands, has recently closed a number of locations...

item.title: Crypto’s big ‘Uptober’ ends with a whimper, Bitcoin down 4%
item.description: While October didn’t bring in big wins for Bitcoin, one analyst says there’s reason to be optimistic for the cryptocurrency’s growth.

item.title: Research monkeys got loose after a truck overturned on a highway. Their owner, destination, and exact purpose remain shrouded in mystery
item.description: The Mississippi crash is one of at least three major monkey escapes in the U.S. over the past four years.

item.title: How a Work Permit Renewal Change Threatens Companies and Employees With Legal Troubles
item.description: An end to the automatic extension of legal immigrant work permits could upend many companies. Start the renewal process as early as possible.
